title: Calories in a Pink Lady Apple
meta_description: Learn calories in pink lady apple, including full nutrition facts like carbs, fiber, sugars, protein, and fat for one medium fruit.
h1: Calories in a Pink Lady Apple
assumptions: Medium size (~182 g), raw, with skin, fresh; values based on USDA data for Pink Lady variety.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by apple size, ripeness, growing conditions, and storage; check labels or apps for specifics.

quick_answer.text: One medium Pink Lady apple provides ~95 kcal and ~4.4 g fiber.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one pink lady apple?
faqs.a: About 95 kcal for a medium Pink Lady apple.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a pink lady apple?
faqs.a: Approximately 25 g carbs, including 4.4 g fiber and 19 g sugars.

faqs.q: Is a pink lady apple low in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, only 0.3 g total fat per medium apple, with 0 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: How much fiber in pink lady apple?
faqs.a: Around 4.4 g dietary fiber per medium apple, aiding digestion.
